note: Study nature, try to undo the reinventions of the wheel which have burdened us with the flat blown-out tire we now adore as the internet with its world wide web standards, social media and the scripted frameworks that make the babble impossible to unravel ... in order to get rolling, we should go back to the internetwork philosophy of people like Paul Baran in 1950s when practical, robust, distributed, decentralized communications were being proposed that would survive a thermonuclear world war.
